revision.text:
== History ==
Historically, Juniper product codenames have been based on gin-based alcoholic beverages, of which the Juniper berry is an ingredient. Some recent product codenames have diverged from this scheme.
== Product Codenames ==
*[[T-series]] **[[TX Matrix]] - Hobson **[[TX4]] - Absolut **[[T1600]] - Stinger **[[T640]] - Gibson **[[T320]] - Bombay *[[M-series]] **[[M320]] - Sinatra **[[M160]] - Manhattan **[[M120]] - Reno **[[M40e]] - Alexander **[[M40]] - Martini **[[M20]] - Cosmo **[[M10i]] - Hobbes **[[M7i]] - Calvin **[[M10]] - Chaser **[[M5]] - Half Chaser *[[MX-series]] **[[MX2020]] - Tiny **[[MX2010]] - ? **[[MX960]] - Harry **[[MX480]] - Calypso **[[MX240]] - Hermes **[[MX80]] - Taz **[[DPC-R]] - Atlas (L3) **[[DPC-X]] - Triton (L2.5) **[[DPC-Q]] - Bellini (IQ) *[[PTX-series]] **[[PTX5000]] - Sangria *[[EX-series]] - Hurricane **[[EX3200]] **[[EX4200]] **[[EX8200]] *[[J-series]] - Pepsi **J4350/J6350 - Dr. Pepper **J2320/J2350 - Shasta *[[E-series]] **[[E320]] - REX **[[E120]] - Mini-REX *[[SRX-Series]] - Australia **[[SRX5800]] - A40 **[[SRX5600]] - A20 **[[SRX3600]] **[[SRX3400]] **[[SRX650]] - Thor **[[SRX240]] - Vidar **[[SRX210]] - Loki *Other **BX-Series - Vino **JunOS-ES - Viking **PC - [[Olive]] **J20 GGSN - Mojito *Cards **MX DPC 40x10/100/1000 - Pegasus **MX DPC 20x1G / 2x10G - Dione **MX MPC Trio 3D 16x10G - Agent Smith **MX MPC4 2x100G / 32x10G - Snorkel
